articles.title: THIS Japanese diet practice can help in weight loss (Try it) - The Times of India
articles.description: ​From eating to practicing mindfulness, Japanese have set a benchmark in everything that directly and indirectly impacts health.
articles.content: In the 80% eating rule in Japan, also known as "hara hachi bu," you eat until you are 80% full. The Japanese phrase translates to, "Eat until you are eight parts full".
